dialogue.speaker: Bob
dialogue.message: "Hey Charlie and Alice, I've noticed some unusual behavior from a few people in town lately. Have you noticed anything suspicious? We need to work together to keep our community safe."

dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: Based on my investigation, I have reason to believe that Charlie is the assassin. We need to act quickly to ensure everyone's safety and vote Charlie out.
